name: Christmas Toy Factory
description:
Christmas is fast approaching and all the elves are busy in Santa's Toy Factory making toys for all the girls and boys.

Unusually, this year sees a lot of boys and girls who have been good, and the toy factory is very busy.

You have been recruited by Father Christmas to help out with the collecting and packing of the toys.

The game is simple and a lot of fun for children and adults of all ages. Help Santa and his elves to collect and pack the toys by tapping on a toy as it comes off the factory production line.

Be careful though, because any missed toy will fall off the conveyor belt and break.

Sometimes the factory suffers a mechanical problem and broken toys find their way on to the belt - don't collect these!

The game requires sharp wits and good hand/eye coordination, with each level more challenging that the last.

Don't worry though, elves, Rudolph, snowmen and even Santa will lend a hand from time to time.

Happy holidays!
